name: Frosted Banana Bars
author: Jennifer Kenkel
instructions: In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Beat in eggs, bananas and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; add to creamed mixture and mix well. Pour into a greased 15 x 10 x 1 inch baking pan. Bake at 350Â° for 25 minutes or until bars test done. Cool.
